detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 1
detailed_analysis.text: Hello, hello, hello, I am Anmol Tiwari and I am here to represent our project and I wanted to talk about our product.

grammar.corrected_text: Hello, hello, hello, I am Anmol Tiwari and I am here to represent our project and I wanted to talk about our product.

detailed_analysis.judgment: Flawless grammar. Everything reads clean and natural. This section wanders off-topic; try anchoring it closer to the core discussion. Positive tone all around — it draws the reader in naturally. Emotionally steady — well-balanced delivery overall.

detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 2
detailed_analysis.text: So our product is like AI debate, analysis and for.

grammar.corrected_text: To our product is like of debate, analysis and for.

detailed_analysis.judgment: Slight grammatical bumps — barely noticeable though. Your ideas connect to the topic, but could use a bit more precision in parts. Comes off somewhat negative; try framing critiques in a more constructive tone. Emotionally steady — well-balanced delivery overall.

speaker_summary.Speaker 1: Not a single grammatical flaw; it’s all very natural. Some contributions feel detached from the core theme — try re-anchoring them.
speaker_summary.Speaker 2: Grammar needs a bit of fine-tuning, though your ideas come through strongly. You’re mostly on track, though some parts could stick closer to the theme.
